website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable service dog vest with multiple colors available. The reflective piping on the vest provides safety at night.
pros: 6 different size options and 5 color choices
Nylon handle built into the vest is very sturdy
Customers like the price point and build quality
cons: Included "Service Dog" patches are too small
Dog owners say buckles are poorly placed for smaller dogs

customer_reviews.title: To many cons not enough pros
customer_reviews.text: It's a good harness works well. Seems like it's comfortable and soft for the dog. The middle part adjusts well. The patches do in fact still say the company's name, which in my opinion is trashy and looks very unprofessional as a service dog team. I also would add that the print is grey against black and looks quite dull so reading is difficult. The handle placement is poorly thought out as it blocks a good portion of what your patches say. The patches are there to read, blocking them makes that difficult. The front size adjuster is also very difficult to use, I haven't quite figured it out yet, other than getting a fraction of an inch to move.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. The only thing I don't like is that the company is on the service dog patches. I want people to know she's a service dog, but I don't to market the company info with this announcement. I don't think that's appropriate at all. Otherwise my rating would be 5 stars. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Keri J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. Thank you for your service to our country as well. The vest is for my service dog Hope. I bought a different vest from another company and 6 months later it lays in pieces. It is nice to know that y'all provide a quality product and it arrives quickly. Plus it is light weight and she still has room to grow! She is a Pitbull White German Shepherd mix, a year old and stought! Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Harness I've seen on a dog
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Harness I've seen on a dog. Looks great on Viper (my Belgian Malinois) Good quality and very strong. Viper is getting a lot of attention when he is wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice vest. The color is very nice, it looks sturdy and professional, and the fit is decent. It appears to adjust to fit a wide variety of dogs. My one complaint is that the reflective stitching is only on one side of the nylon straps. As the straps on the vest are adjusted, the reflective side disappears leaving half of the vest displaying the pretty, reflective trim and half the vest as just a solid nylon strap. If both sides of the straps were reflective so that the stitching was continuous no matter how the vest was adjusted, I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Clutton

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT IN-VESTMENT--pardon the pun, lol
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this new vest on my dog!!! She even likes it, and using the clip on the shoulder area seems to control her MUCH better--no more pulling!! I dont care for the makers label on it, but i just glued a patch over it, so no biggie! Ive gotten compliments everywhere ive gone with her wearing it so far. WELL worth the money, this seems really built to last. I hope, anyway, because I love the way it fits her and looks on her. The paracord collar matches perfectly and so does her leash! One of my best buys on amazon so far, and i shop here alot!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Moon

customer_reviews.title: Good vest bad sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: It's a good vest. It seems to fit well and be comfortable on my cockapoo service dog. It's easy to adjust and it holds it's size. I will say the sizing chart listed for this item is incorrect. Check manufacturers website for correct sizing information. Other than that it appears to be a good buy at this point only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: donny

customer_reviews.title: Love the design!
customer_reviews.text: This vest fits perfectly and is easy for both me and my K9 companion to put on him and take off. The removable service dog patches are great and the handle makes this vest one of my favorites. Don't hesitate to purchase! ***updated to add*** I have since purchased additional vests, for other dogs, and still love the quality of this product. The best thing about it is the ease of wear for my dogs. We have two service dogs in our family as we'll as some therapy dogs, and they careen go in and out of vehicles, walk, sit, lie down, crawl, and roll over with getting snagged or hindered by the vest!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Not great for dogs that pull backwards.
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd escaped from this harness like Houdini on meth. If your dog pulls backwards, BE CAREFUL or she (he) will slip out of this harness like a lubed up fish. Good for well mannered pups but any large breed that pulls back away from you will have the ability to slip out of this thing with almost no issue. ...and may run right into a speeding car. Poor Sheila.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Del Vecchio

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart is wrong!!
customer_reviews.text: The sizing of vest is very wrong on order chart.. BEWARE!! I ordered XS for my dog measuring the girth/chest size to be 16 "exactly" according to size chart its16 & should adjust to 21' as to have a few extra inches to extend straps as he grows, although it does NOT get any bigger than 16' girth, I now have to order a bigger size AGAIN. Product is made of good quality but crappy misguided measurements!
customer_reviews.author: Sh@rie

customer_reviews.title: IMPROVED
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd harness from Chai'S Choice! Bought my first one back in 2018. To this day it looks like it hasn't been used at all. Keep in mind My dog wears it every day all day, but not at night. It shows no signs of wear . OH YES, it does need washing. Chai's Choice did make some improvements. The clips are a little bigger and "much easier" to close and open! Thank you for that!! The sign on both sides fit a lot better! Also did I mention the size I bought is an XS harness.
customer_reviews.author: Alice F.

customer_reviews.title: How do you spell GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth service dog vest I've purchased and kept.... my big girl silver lab weighing in at 96 lbs of muscle with a barrel chest. Why did I write that? Because of her size and barrel chest it can be very difficult finding a service vest or even a harness that not only fits correctly, but fits comfortably. She told me this is best vest yet!! I love everything... the fit, the adjustability, how it sits on her, the texture, the padding and the color is wonderful. I do highly recommend. I have purchased and returned a few because they fit terrible. So go ahead... buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Very good harness.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only one I could find to fit our 45# husky. It's very easy to get on and off, and the "Service Animal" velcro labels on either side of the vest serve their purpose well. It seems well constructed and padded. The only problem is that it loosens up from time to time, and I have to readjust the fit. Our service dog is comfortable wearing it. We had tried a couple of others that he didn't like at all.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Not sure my puppy sees this as "comfortable. but it keeps her safer. I do wish it would come with patches that say something other than "Service Dog" as I saw one on Walmart yesterday on a dog that was definitely NOT a service dog. Please don't encourage that. Also, it would be nice to come with patches that fit the size. We ordered small and no patches seem to fit that without going over the edges where puppy will chew.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Love the bright color and the fact that you can ...
customer_reviews.text: The vest is well manufactured. The only issue we had was that the sizing wasn't quite right for our dog. The Large was too large and the medium is not snug enough and moves around a bit. The small was way too small. The buckle on the medium isn't tight enough for us to get it snug around her. Each dog is different and our dog has a deep chest so that could be the issue. Love the bright color and the fact that you can remove the patches if you want to use it just as a reflective vest during an evening walk.
customer_reviews.author: Evy

customer_reviews.title: Best Harness Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful harness which my service dog doesn't mind at all. I have some that are uncomfortable for him and although he never refuses to wear any harness...this is obviously his favorite. The sturdy handle at the top is very convenient as well and I love the choice of colors. I picked the teal blue which is more of a turquoise (my favorite). It is easy for me, with my disabilities to deal with the large snaps to put it on too. Me and my dog both love this vest/harness. Great that it glows in the dark as well. Best harness for the money that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: SooZen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blend of sturdy craftsmanship and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Carleigh is the service animal at our school. She loves to play ball with kids and play chase around the playground. She also loves to be read to after playing hard. This vest is the perfect blend of comfort to play hard and rest. The Velcro service dog patch is the perfect size and does not interfere with Carleigh's job or fun. I took the mid-strap off that runs from the collar to the waist strap. It was only getting in the way and I could see not need for it. Highly recommend this service dog vest.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Winsor

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase harness for my medium size Shih Tzu Bizzy. The straps are easy to adjust. I prefer a harness over a collar he’s easier to manage when going on walks. But this particular one I’m able to bring him along without any questions. If you going to use this harness and may be a good idea to get them licensed some businesses will ask you for proof. Plus blue is his favorite color LOL
customer_reviews.author: Treena

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Soft Yet Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 pound psychiatric service dog and I needed a new vest for her. The last one I bought, the reflective letters saying service dog peeled off the patches. This new one is very bright and easy to read. The clip on the harness is great quality, and the fabric is tough but soft enough that my pup can wear it all day with no trouble. I use the handle to life her up onto my lap all the time, it is very sturdy. Would recommend for anyone with a small service animal who wants something visible and a fun color, but also practical. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, comfortable fit for my dog. Easy to put on her.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size, fits my dog comfortably without any big buckles. Very easy for me to put on her as I am not able to do any BLTs (Bending, lifting, twisting or squatting). I place it over her head and then a quick snap of one buckle and she's ready to go. Easy to reach top loop as well. I only wish that it were a little longer down her back, with another Velcro spot for Canine Good Citizen award or other patches as needed. Her trainer also loved the vest and asked where I'd purchased it from.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fit my French Bulldog Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this harness. I used the measurement chart and it fit my hard to fit French Bulldog with no problem. She is a full figured girl and only 2 brands on the market fit her and this is one of them. With such a deep chest, I didn't have to resort to a large to accomodate her chest and hope to be able to shorten the waist enough which most I couldn't, rendering it useless. Great quality/durable yet light weight and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: zinnia

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it’s a beautiful products seems to be durable but again my dog ...
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately got the wrong size. And I can’t figure out how to contact the company. It’s far too large for my service dog to use and I have never been able to exchange it. I was hoping my dog would grow into it but it’s just not going to happen. Otherwise it’s a beautiful products seems to be durable but again my dog can’t wear it. I accidentally ordered the xx large but I needed just a large.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B.

customer_reviews.title: And what i received didn't even look anything like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This is not a service vest. There is no place to put the patches. And what i received didn't even look anything like the picture. Save your money, if you're looking for a service vest, and find it somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my service dog, stitching well done, handle on the exterior is a great benefit as larger dogs (she has PTSD from a large dog that shook her in his mouth in her prior service vest) do create some anxiety but with handle easy enough to place hand there and help her feel more secure. I am not being compensated for this review but after going through 3 vests to finally find one that is of good quality, does it's job well and helps my dog feel secure, I give it a high five. I'll be back if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Mac

customer_reviews.title: Super Adjustability! Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time getting a vest for my corgi since she is rather oddly shaped: broad chest, but small waist,wider at the shoulders but small neck and head. In short (pun intended) I needed lots of adjustable straps. This was my third try and it was the charm! Very sturdy, quality vest. Looks great, and the pink is plenty showy. Now she’s like a furry accessory I take with me!
customer_reviews.author: Fluff n Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Harness is great quality. I have an English bulldog and have a hard time finding a harness that fits her body. It is light weight patches are clear and good size. Best of all my dog appears to be very comfortable in it which is important when she is out with me doing her job as a service dog. We actually bought a second one for another dog who is not a service dog & just got name patches to replace the patches that came with it
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M Owen

customer_reviews.title: Love this !!
customer_reviews.text: This was for a family members service dog. She had purchased a different one that was a bit longer down the back and wanted to replace it with some thing not as long down the back. I ordered this for her and she loves it. Her dog wears this one in the summer as it helps him stay cooler because the length is not long. It’s bright and easy to see. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described & great price!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think I’d find another one like this... took two years. Exactly as described. First one was misplaced by Vet staff. Works for my 140lb Pyrenees w/o choking her or me getting rope burns on my arthritic hands & I have better overall control w/ much more of her surface area covered w/ the cushioned vest. None of the edges cut into her skin. Easy to adjust & put on. She stepped right into it. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Not good for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: This vest has a very high-quality and I feel as if it’s made really well. If you have a medium size dog, I’m sure this will be great. However if you have a large dog with a big chest or long neck. This is not going to be a good harness at all. It does not sit far enough back on the dog and a striped rubs it’s front legs. I actually purchased two of these and the largest one they offered just because of that reason. It barely fixed the issue. It’s just simply not a long enough vest. It’s meant for a compact dog like a smart car LOL.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXANDER WAYNE

customer_reviews.title: Chest strap was too short for my dane
customer_reviews.text: Like all Danes my dog has a deep chest so it won't be a problem for everyone. Unfortunately, the padded chest strap was a major selling point. The short padded chest strap (black) pulled the buckled chest strap (pink) which caused the pink strap to rotate slightly and caused a couple of big raw patches under her elbows when she was doing a lot of counter balancing for me. They did heal and now I have her wear the harness without the chest strap.
customer_reviews.author: Saila

customer_reviews.title: Runs big.
customer_reviews.text: This harness did NOT come with the velcro patches at all. Also it must run very big becuase it's so large on my schnauzer. I measured her and got the medium like it suggested. Nope I should have got a small. I'm so disappointed that it didnt come with the patches. Just disappointed all around.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS VEST!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vest about four months now and can't say one negative word about it! Fits my Large Boston Terrier perfectly and has plenty of adjustability give or take. Dog seems very comfortable after long periods of "working" Velcro areas are well stitched to allow many changes for '1 1/2' inch PTSD or Diabetic patches. I chose the bright orange colored vest for night vision and it's reflective nature and it's perfect! Now I'm buying another one of a different color strictly for vanity/fashion.
customer_reviews.author: DinoBoyWonder

customer_reviews.title: Fits 63lb fine with room to grow
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and got my 63 pound lab an extra large. It fits her just snug at the tightest connection. There's about 5-6 inches I could add in girth and 10" around neck area. Good quality and I noticed that there are two signs one on each side says service dog. The manufacturer is not putting their name on it now. Very heavy duty and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Vv

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and not at all what a service dog harness should be. Handle would be good for a toy breed but not a 25+ animal. The stitching is single stitching again not for a harness. The color was described and pictured as teal, the color was blue. The sellers name printed under the service dog lettering was shown as small but in actuality it was LARGE and very noticable. If they Chai's Choice wants free advertising make a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Britt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed upon opening the vest. It is a very high quality material and fits my dog perfectly. The color is super flattering on him. I like how secure it fits and the tags are nice and bold. He’s a 32 lb Boston terrier and I ordered him the side medium. His chest is 24-25inches.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey D.

customer_reviews.title: Handle too heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice vest overall but there is a rubber handle over top of the nylon one that’s part of the vest. This makes the entire handle too heavy so the dog feels something thumbing on its back as they walk. The rubber part makes it hard to get a good grip on the handle because it slides around unless you can squeeze really hard to prevent the rubber from sliding across the nylon strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy service dog vest
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the pink vest in size L for our 55 pound chocolate lab. She looks very chic in it. I'm happy to get away from the traditional red this time. This is padded and seems very comfortable for her. There is also a sturdy rubber handle on the top in case my daughter needs to hold the dog closer.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Not worth my money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly was disappointed bought 2 and they fell apart my dogs only got to wear them a few times before they were unusable definitely wont buy again need more durability for sure which is sad because my smaller dog is very obedient she dosnt even tear up cheap dog toys shes gentle on things so it came to shock that this fell apart
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Well made seems very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, thick materials with secure clasps actually better than I expected. I am a veteran with a 70% service related disability and my dog was a support dog and just completed training to be my service dog and this was the best looking vest I could find. Plus I wanted to support other veterans by purchasing from a veteran.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Eugene Scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for our 12lb Westhighland Mix ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality overall - perfectly adjusted for my 12lb Westhighland Mix - was literally able to take it out of the plastic bag & put it on my dog - fitted perfectly - our little guy doesn’t mind it - took him out for a wee walk & he didn’t mind it at all - super easy to take off & put on - seems to have two really hardy clips & overall appears to be really well made ...
customer_reviews.author: Canadian Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, fits perfectly. I ordered a med by the size chart and was worried it would b a bit snug and it fits perfectly. The color is bright and vibrant. The handle and leash loop is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit.
customer_reviews.text: Good harness but underneath strap hard to fit and the harness itself is hard to fit. I don't use the padded piece underneath because I just couldn't get it to work and because it's removable, I can use the harness without it, "Service Dog" patch is WAY oversized. Fortunately, I have another patch that is smaller and works.
customer_reviews.author: Red Cat

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Seems Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: This harness was exactly what I was looking for! I love the Velcro strips on the side so I can change the patches. The quality also seems like it will last for a long time. I did have to return the first one as it didn’t fit correctly but the next smaller size worked perfect! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to exchange the first order as sizing was off from the size chart. The harness runs smaller than stated. The replacement arrived very quickly and my refund for the first one was very prompt. The harness is great! It's light weight and fits great. The handle makes for easy lifting of my service dog. Color is vibrant and the quality if good. I like the removable chest piece too. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but not great for smaller/medium dogs
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice looking, well made harness. However, I agree with other reviewers about the buckle being misplaced for the smaller dogs. It fell right under my 28 lb terrier/lab mix's armpit and left a huge blister. They need to redesign the strap underneath somehow. The buckle is just too big for dogs under 35/40 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Lola

customer_reviews.title: Not for all shapes of dogs
customer_reviews.text: Vest is hard to the touch. Plus difficult to get the dog out of. I have a dachshund and to make it small enough to not come off, the part that goes over her head was too tight and I had to struggle to get it off her head, making her yelp. If I loosened that part, her legs would come out. Maybe it’s just because dachshunds have such a funky shape but this harness didn’t work for me. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Beautiful color. My dog is not a service dog but I bought this to deter people from petting her when I bring her places because sometimes simply asking does not work. I love that it doesn’t look like a traditional service dog vest because that’s not what I was looking for. It’s cute and sporty :) I got an XL for my female Rottweiler. She’s 80lbs and it fits great. I also put decorative pins on it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Yes I would highly recommend this beautiful SD harness!
customer_reviews.text: This SD harness was better than I could have imagined, a beautiful bright Teal color, very sturdy, easy to take on & off, and it fits well with adjustments. My 8 month old multi-gen Aussie Labrodoodle looks fantastic in it. He always gets a lot of attention in public, but with his beautiful jacket much more than usual. He grows out of everything every 2 wks. So I decided on the XLarge size, then folded & velcroed the excess belts under the pockets. It looks perfect, holds tight, and I can let it out as needed. He runs to me when I get his gear out because he knows we will be having new adventures.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the right size dog
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and nice vest. Unfortunately my dog is very big being an English Mastiff and it seems like the makers just used a large vest and used longer straps to make it an XXL. Looks very small on the dog. Also, I wish there were more spots for patches because I would love to put my don’t pet patch on and “I’m working don’t pet” patch.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this vest on Saturday morning. Got our shipment Sunday night, but it was the wrong size....despite the fact I ordered a large. I sent in for a return and replacement, which I received today. Once fitted to our dog, it fits great. It seems to be made of great materials and appearance sturdy. Despite the mess up in the beginning, I would recommend this vest for other service dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Coley

customer_reviews.title: High quality harness
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for my beagle and liked it so much we got one for our Australian Shepherd. Neither are service dogs, those tags are Velcro and easily removed. They are soft and comfortable for the dog but rigid enough my crazed beagle won’t escape it. The handle comes in very handy while trying to get the hooks closed while my beagle tries to bounce like a ping pong ball - she gets overly excited to put it on!
customer_reviews.author: Jonna M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good, durable harness, but getting a proper fit is a bit challenging
customer_reviews.text: This was almost too small for my 15lb poodle. However, it’s also the best harness/vest I’ve purchased for my service dog. Seems to be very durable, the price was excellent, and I feel like this is an excellent choice for a service dog.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing materials is order again and again
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the vest. My dog measures weird so this is strike number 2 for vests, but I'm going to order the next size up and keep my fingers crossed. The first vest I bought I didnt really like, yours is made out of good quality material and is strong. It fits her. It not comfortably it bunches up under her shoulders. I'm hoping a medium fits her great. Shes a mix breed with the build of a pit but she is much smaller and hopefully not get bigger at this point as she is over 2 years old. Thank you for spending so much time that you spend on these vests.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: The adjustment sucks, needs just one more inch to be perfect for my Mini Doberman. I measured him with a 16inch chest so he was an xs maybe I should have just have gotten a small. He looks very good in it and I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: JusaintRite

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Harness
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, it just took a lot of effort to move the straps to size it properly (very stiff) and the front attachment is a pain in the butt ~ we ended up taking it off completely and it made a huge difference in how it fit (excellent). Only giving 4 stars because of the difficulty. Also the orange is not really as pictured, it's a fluorescent orange (very bright!) but will make him more visible at night.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa & Sammy's Big Adventure

customer_reviews.title: TOP NOTCH QUALITY AND SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I am the CEO and Founder of Trinity Outdoors Disabled Adventures. This harness is the 2nd one I have bought from this company. In our line of charity work we try to bless individuals with disabilities with service dogs. Therefore upon beginning of training I have found it very easy and hassle free to get this quality made product from Chai's Choice Best...and since the owner is prior military there will be no other choices than to deal with this decorated veteran. GOD BLESS YOU AND AMERICA. Jason J. Bland/ CEO & Founder of Trinity Outdoors Disabled Adventures
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Well Padded Harness
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice harness! It is excellently padded for the dog's comfort and fits well. I highly recommend this harness, it's sturdy, as well as comfortable for the dog. The built in handle is great for a dog that assists with mobility issues or any application where you need to hold onto the dog's back. Even if it's not for a service dog, the patches are Velcro and can be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Witchypoo

customer_reviews.title: Fits my dog well
customer_reviews.text: After a few adjustments, this fit my smaller dog well. It seems to be comfortable because she doesn't have rubbed spots and hasn't tried to scratch at it to take it off. You will need to order the leash separately.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful vest harness. It is well made and is adjustable around the neck and mid line so you get a perfect fit. It is sturdy but flexible and my dog, a Jack Russell, loves wearing it. I’ve tried several harnesses and this is by far the best one I’ve ever seen. And I loved the color choices. Judging from the way it is made, it should last a very long time. So happy.
customer_reviews.author: linda mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Great harness size small for 24 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: Size small. This is perfect for my 26 lb mini Aussie. She has a girth of 24 to 25 inches. Its just right for smaller dogs. I purchased another one on here thst was heavy duty and too big and strong for my dog. This is great, smaller straps and more limber.
customer_reviews.author: Starman

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the item. I was a little concerned about size when it arrived. I ordered a Medium. I have a 50 lb. Australian shepherd and there wasn't much extra space, but after using it a couple days I noticed that it really should be a bit more snug so I adjusted. It fits perfect. The quality is very good. The service dog labels that come with it are very good quality. I just wish they made other choices for the labels. I am using my dog as a therapy dog and have to purchase separate labels.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product....question size
customer_reviews.text: Probably my fault, but; the vest has a lot of play for shifting around the dog's body. Bought the size according to chart. I think it runs a bit larger. Maybe this was meant for growth???? My dog is still a pup, so I'm sure she will grow into the harness as it is constructed well and appears it will last a great while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Vest we have used to this point!
customer_reviews.text: I use multi vests,to make sure they stay fresh and clean! This is my first “other color” vest, my service fur, once it’s put on, goes right into working fur! It fit perfect! Loved the padded under belly wide band, kiwi also was more comfortable, she is unable to pull out of it(we attempt all ways to escape the vest,just for safety! This vest passed with A+ 10/10!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Holden

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this product. The sizing is exactly what I expected it to be and it fits my dog nicely. The vest is made out of a thick quality material and is holding up nicely. My dog actually really enjoys wearing it! The handle is nice and easy to use, and the text on the vest is easy to notice. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent harness! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This harness is excellent for my head strong Lhasa Apso. It is easier to guide him on walks and through crowds. I have had to use the handle to remove him from a barking contest with other dogs. He's a work in progress because he still reacts to other dogs. The harness is well made and easy to get on and off. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Vici Hill

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and looks great. The small is a bit smaller than expected and the handle on the small is not very helpful as the straps holding the handle are too short to be able to actually grasp the handle itself, but it still can be used to hold the dog back. The medium is really great and fits my dog very well. The color matches the photos online as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tavia Hall

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted piece
customer_reviews.text: This is the best service vest I have ever purchased. The color is awesome and it is light weight. It is so well made a very sturdy product. The black piece that connects the neck piece and the breast piece is removable which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: My dog actually runs to have his harness put on. Very easy to take on and off. I am very sure both of us are satisfied with this product/harness. We have had it for a few months now and it still looks great. Perhaps the velcro tag on one side is curling just a little with use but no problem. Seams and everything else is great. Really like the high visibility details. There is a place to add a carrying pouch if needed.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly rosetta

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for frequent use
customer_reviews.text: After years of my pup dragging around a bulky vest, it was time to get him something more sporty and comfortable. This vest looks great on him, it's breathable and lightweight but thick and durable enough that it looks very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Arcadia DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: All the great benefits in a Service dog vest.
customer_reviews.text: I used my last Chi Service dog vest over a year now. I need to wash it, so I bought another just in case. Plus it is always good to have an extra just in case. Also seems cool for dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kare R.N.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this harness! So do both my dogs! Very well made very durable padded perfectly and fits snug and comfortably! The reflective stripping is extremely bright! 1 dog never wants to take it off and the other dog loves how it feels so much she litterally falls asleep within seconds of putting it on..lol she almost looks drugged.. Shes in a heavenly bliss almost like a hug me jacket for stress lol
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Adjusting the straps suck, but if you can be patience the product does look professional.
customer_reviews.text: The product in itself is really great! The only downside are the straps. It was a pain to adjust the straps. Thank goodness my dog has patience because he was looking at me like I was crazy lol. I had to eventually take the product off of my dog, so I don’t torture him anymore in order to adjust the straps. Now it fits nice and snug and it got the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. TrueLove never disappoints. My pomeranian is 10 pounds and the small fits perfectly. Her measurement is 19.5. "Service dog" tags are promotion free. Other customers complained of having a promotion on tags. This in not my case. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BJ73

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this service dog vest, and so does my dog! It seems to be comfortable on him, allows him to sit, lay down, run and walk comfortably. It is beautiful, looks professional, and works as a no pull harness proficiently I love the removable chest piece! it makes dressing and undressing so easy and comfortable! It fits correctly, but understand that nylon stretches as it is worn, so don't order too large of a size. The vest was also delivered in a timely manner and was perfectly packaged!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Green

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not comfortable for my small sized dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality stable hard vest. But not appropriate was my chihuahua. I bought xs size, it fitted perfectly but the problem is my dog can not move comfortablely with the vest. It's not flexible and I can not recommend it for small sized dogs. I'm planing to return it because my dog won't be comfortable wearing it for long hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A serious vest
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely well made and very nice color, but I had to return because the hardware and materials on the XS were too heavy for a 10 pound Yorkie. If they made the small sizes with narrower/lighter straps, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS HARNESS!!! SO DOES MY IRISH WOLFHOUND! :)
customer_reviews.text: I had a regular harness but my Irish Wolfhound seemed to slow down on the way home from our walks. I determined the harness was rubbing his armpits a little. When I got this new harness I immediately fit it to him and off we went. The change was crazy good! He was more excited than ever, I noticed he trotted around and was more energetic during our walk, all the way there and all the way back. So happy he is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Clayton

customer_reviews.title: The vest itself is a bit short but other than that the quality it’s really good. So much better then the previous vest we ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the XL for my 84lb Weimaraner. Having a large chest I had to let the straps out almost to their maximum. Still not sure if it will be to tight. Letting him wear it around for a bit to see how he does. The vest itself is a bit short but other than that the quality it’s really good. So much better then the previous vest we owned that was made cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: sweetkate

customer_reviews.title: Best harness and most affordable I've tried so far
customer_reviews.text: Best harness and most affordable I've tried so far! I have a six month Golden Retriever and at that age they are very in between sizes. This harness fits perfectly (size med) when tightened all the way, so I know will last while she grows. Super comfortable for her and the blue is so pretty. I bought "in training" patches for the second size to appropriately mark her. I saw some reviews about product label on the patches, mine did not. Love love. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Edwards

customer_reviews.title: And exceptionally well maid service dog harness
customer_reviews.text: This pulling harness is very well made and fits my dog snuggly due to the excellent design and the quality of adjustable straps and buckles. My dog gets all excited when it's time to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE XS HAS PATCHES AND BUCKLES OUT OF PROPORTION TO THE VEST!!!! RIDICULOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ORDERED AN XS FOR MY DOG, AND THE BUCKLE AND PATCHES ARE BIGGER THAN THE VEST!!!!!!! IT LOOKS RIDICULOUS!!!! THE SERVICE DOG PATCH EVEN HANGS OFF IT'S SO LARGE!!!! THE BUCKLE AND RING THAT YOU HOOK THE LEASH ON ARE BIGGER THAN MY DOG!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: t_butko

customer_reviews.title: Too short on the back
customer_reviews.text: I hate how short the back of the vest is I expected a longer vest as I've bought smaller sizes of the light blue vest and those were great this vest is well made just too short make them longer chi's choice
customer_reviews.author: Ariesaphcelie

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT, SO DOES BELLA
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT,SO DOES BELLA,MY POODLE MIX. SMALL FITS GOOD FOR HER 16;LBS. IT RUNS A BIT LARGE,USUALLY I GET A MED. WITH THIS I HAD TO RETURN & GET SMALL. I WOULD LOVE TO SEE ONE A BIT SOFTER TOO. IT'S MADE WELL & LOKS GREAT THOUGH.WELL WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: Great harness
customer_reviews.text: We've only used it a few times, we evwn walk at night so the reflective material is great. Id say it is very well made. The handle is sturdy and it also fits as it should. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfectl
customer_reviews.text: Needed something less restrictive and cooler for in the desert climate. This fit the bill and my dog does not seem to mind it like she did the full service vest.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Good harness. I just wish the loop where you latch the leash was a swivel loop. Sometimes the chest piece gets lopsided and the whole harness with be more to one side but still worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Zane Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Paws Up | Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest for my Frenchie. She's 25 pounds. Fits her perfectly and still has lots of room to make it bigger if need be. It's soft and doesn't pull around her neck, as it sits lower. And the best part is that it is easy to get on and offf. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting vest/harness
customer_reviews.text: The vest fits nicely on my female 62 pound Labrador. I had purchased this vest since it had many colors to choose from and also reflected . My dog is training to be a service dog. I have seen many other dogs with this company and so far everyone has been happy. I would purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MaryReba

customer_reviews.title: Runs Big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 6lb Chihuahua but it is a bit large. I make sure to monitor him constantly so he doesn't try to walk out of it and get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amy June

customer_reviews.title: Run's large.
customer_reviews.text: very nicely made harness by I purchased it in two different sizes and find that it runs very large. By the time that I scaled it down to fit my service animal, it was choking him. I was forced to return it. I did love the reflective trim, I would have loved it had it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lake

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT VEST
customer_reviews.text: Bought a large for my 69 Lb pit mix. The large would fit dogs larger than mine. It is very adjustable. If you're on the fence between a large and XL go with large. Very comfortable and sturdy. Nice material and removable chest piece. LOVE this vest and will be buying in blue and yellow too!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: fit my dog well... people can see her coming and now we have fewer hassles... she has always been dressed but her color was green when young and black once she passed her training... she's a black and white dog and somehow people miss the sigh... this one they don't miss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is both comfortable for the dog and for the human in all ...
customer_reviews.text: Top quality in every aspect with well thought out design. This is both comfortable for the dog and for the human in all situations imaginable. It is a very high quality vest at an extremely affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: toni

customer_reviews.title: Best one I have used yet
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, very sturdy, and seems as though it will last for years to come. May even last longer than a normal dog's life span.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon625

customer_reviews.title: I wrote a bad response for not receiving this package but I found ...
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a bad response for not receiving this package but I found it hidden later on and apologize for the bad review due to that. The product is pretty decent and fits well for my lab at a large size. It gets a bit too warm for at times or for long periods of time it's not the most comfortable but she lived with it. The patch does not say anything else but service dog. And it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: looks super professional. unfortunatelly my furbaby is too tiny so ...
customer_reviews.text: It's beautifu;ly made, looks super professional. unfortunatelly my furbaby is too tiny so I had to return it. It's also made for larger dogs weight wise, since it's substanstial and very serious looking. Matilda only weighs 5lbs so there's nothing to fit her.
customer_reviews.author: sarity

customer_reviews.title: Great for Warding People off from a Nervous Dog!
customer_reviews.text: With a little adjusting (she has a weird shape, she’s in between medium and large) it fits her great! It does do a bit of crookedness if she runs around a lot or I put it on at a funny angle, but I can usually readjust it and it sits just fine! I love it, it’s eyecatching and looks great on her.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Morse

customer_reviews.title: A great harness for a service dog
customer_reviews.text: The best fit my dog per the measurements they gave so I ordered the right size. It is a beautiful blue color which makes my dogs eyes really stand out. It fits him perfect it doesn’t rub and it is great for my service dog.
customer_reviews.author: Texasladyhawke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering from Chai's and I couldn't be happier. Both body harnesses I've ordered are thick, heavy duty material. NOT flimsy at all! For the quality you receive, I think the price is excellent. You'll pay more for cheaper quality at a national pet store. I very highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: great harness
customer_reviews.text: for the price, this is a wonderful harness. You couldn't ask for better. Well made and good looking on your pup. We have an Adolusian Shepherd, big dog and the large fits her well, I would recommend that a D-ring be put on the chest as well for better control of the dog until they are better trained. This is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M Thomas

product_meta.title: Chai's Choice Service Dog Vest Harness Best 2 Reflective Service Dog Patches and Sturdy Handle. Small to Large Breed. 8 Colors and Matching Padded Leash Available. Sizing Chart at Left
product_meta.description:
Size:X-Small| Color:Orange

 This is the Stylish, Safe, Durable SERVICE DOG Harness you have been waiting for! . 

 · Chai's Choice SERVICE DOG Vest is a Premium High Quality Professional harness that is Ergonomically Designed to be Comfortable, Functional, and Safe for your SERVICE DOG. 3M Reflective Material throughout the Harness ensures High Visibility and Safety for You and your Dog in All Conditions. 

 · A Variety of 8 Colors and 6 Sizes Enable You to Custom Fit Your Dog with the Color of your Choice and make Chai's Choice the Top Choice for your SERVICE DOG harness! 

 * Notice* Updated SERVICE DOG hook and loop patches on harness do NOT have Chai's Choice company name on them. .
feature_bullets: Design Based on the Top Selling Chai's Choice Best Front Range Harness which has Over 4000 Reviews with a 4.4 Stars Rating Average
High-Elasticity Sponge Padding Inner Layer; Reflective 3M Scotchlite Piping and Webbing on Adjustable Straps Ensuring High Visibility at Night
Durable Scratch-Resistant Polyester Outer Layer; Lightweight Durable Aluminum "D" Ring Leash Attachment with Built In Sturdy Nylon Handle
2 Removable/Interchangeable Reflective hook and loop "SERVICE DOG" Patches. *UPDATED Bolder Letters Without Company Name*. Removable Chest Padding
Easy On - Easy Off with Innovative Design and Lightweight "Duraflex" Buckle with Large Loading Capacity which Greatly Improves Tensile Strength of Harness

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
